profile:
SMC MASONRY  is a family oriented company that has a wide range of experience and over 40 years experience working on high profile buildings in the G.T.A and Durham Region.  New builds of custom homes and masonry structures including schools and elevator shafts.  All work is supervised by a Gold Seal mason. Here to meet all your masonry needs. We cater to homeownerâ€‹s, business owners, and property managers no matter how large or small the project. Located in Pickering, and serving Durham Region and the G.T.A.

Whether your chimney is in distress or you are looking for a new door or window cut into your home, tuckpointing or new window sills we have the experience you need. Services include but are not limited to foundations, parging, tuckpointing, window sills, chimney repair and rebuilding, brick, block and stone work, window and door openings. We treat every project as if it were our own and are dedicated to getting a little better everyday. 

Our Business Hours: 8:00 am to 5:00 pm

profile:
Dynamic Brick and Stone
We are a company that builds and repairs stone and brick. 
Our goal as a company is achieving total customer satisfaction. Our passion is designing and building quality, one of a kind, stone and brick features for your home.

We build and design
Fireplaces, walkways, patios, back splashes, outdoor and indoor walls, dry-lay stone walls and artistic centerpieces.
And so much more! 

Replace and repair services include:

Replace all damaged brick and stone, 
Repair all cracked or damaged joints,
Replace broken or damaged flagstone,
Sealing or re-sealing flagstone,
Power washing dirt and grime off all patios, walkways and homes.
